Class CommandLineInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable

        • eftaios.view.cli.CommandLineInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventVisitor, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CLIClient, OnlineCommandLineInterface, RMILocalCommandLineInterface

    public class CommandLineInterface
extends View

      void run()
      Function starts the CLI thread.
      void visitEvent(EndGameEvent event)
      Function that is called by the GameEvent accepter when the game has ended It updates the console and shows the end menu

      Function that is called by the GameEvent accepter when the turn has just ended It updates the console and shows the player's functions menu

      Function that is called when the user has picked a GreenEscapePodCard It updates the console and shows the player's functions menu

      Function that is called by the GameEvent accepter when the writing on the file isn't correctly executed It updates the console and ends the game

      Function that is called by the GameEvent accepter when the user has landed an attack ->get a lists of the eliminated players and checks ->if the size is 0, the player has killed no one ->if the size is >0, than the player has killed a list of players It updates the console and shows the player's functions menu

        public void visitEvent(SuccessfulAttackEvent event)
        Function that is called by the GameEvent accepter when the user has landed an attack ->get a lists of the eliminated players and checks ->if the size is 0, the player has killed no one ->if the size is >0, than the player has killed a list of players It updates the console and shows the player's functions menu

      • visitEvent

        public void visitEvent(NoiseInAnySectorEvent event)
        Function that is called when the user has picked a NoiseInAnySectorCard. It waits for the user's input (the sector to make noise). Then it updates the console and shows the player's functions menu
        Specified by:
        visitEvent in interface EventVisitor
        Overrides:

      • visitEvent

        public void visitEvent(NoiseInYourSectorEvent event)
        Function that is called when the user has picked a NoiseInYourSectorCard. It outputs the user's position Then it updates the console and shows the player's functions menu
        Specified by:
